title: About me
description:
Hey there ‚Äî welcome to my space!
 I love building meaningful things that make life a little easier and more delightful. I'm passionate about fast-paced environments, creative problem-solving, and crafting experiences that not only work well, but look interesting too. :))

title: My Time at UMass
description:
Four years at UMass have given me unforgettable memories, lifelong friendships, meaningful lessons ‚Äî and some seriously good food.
I‚Äôve had the privilege to learn from world-class educators and grow alongside some truly brilliant minds.
I‚Äôm proud to be a UMass student, and even prouder to be part of its alumni community. üíúüå≤

title: BeatCode
description:
A dual-battle coding game inspired by LeetCode and Tetris, built in collaboration with my best friend, Bao Dang.
I had the chance to work with FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Auth, PassLib, and explore the frontend using Svelte.
The project launch exceeded our expectations: 300+ accounts, 1,000+ unique visitors, and 4,800+ page views ‚Äî all within the first 12 hours of deployment.

title: Cloud Cue
description:
A real-time word suggestion tool built to support non-native speakers during interviews, inspired by the struggles I saw many international students face.
I got to work with AWS Transcribe, Facebook OPT-1.3b, S3, and visualized predictions through a live word cloud interface.
The tool transcribes speech on the fly and suggests likely next words based on context ‚Äî helping users speak more confidently, one word at a time.

title: Resume Agent
description:
An agent that help CS students tailor their resume!
The pipeline? Simple!
Describe me what you have done for the work, as detailed as possible, and whoalah, a standard CS resume is created!

title: OhEss (OS)
description:
An inspired window 10 interface that runs on Webpage interface üò≤
It not just mimic the interface of the Window 10, but you can actually runs program there! Try out Linux and Kolibri üòâ
The project is heavily inspired by JSLinux by Fabrice Bellard's

title: Avocademy (YC 22)
altTitle: The Power Of Love - Francesco Parrino
description:
A scrappy little startup with a big goal: make job hunting as effortless as possible.
We built a platform that crawls new job listings daily, lets users bookmark the ones they love, and auto-fills applications like magic.
I teamed up with the crew using FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Playwright, and the OpenAI API to pull out the juicy details ‚Äî all wrapped in a smooth CI/CD flow and shipped on Vercel.

title: FPT Software
description:
My second-year summer was full of excitement working at FPT Software, where I helped build a full-cycle management webpage for the Japanese Pharmacists Association using NgRx and RxJS.
With support from an amazing boss and team, I tackled 20,000+ data bindings between frontend and backend ‚Äî turning a once-daunting task into something smooth and scalable.
Along the way, I squashed bugs, streamlined workflows, and grew a ton as a developer.

title: Viettel AI
description: My third-year summer was all about NLP ‚Äî working with Viettel AI to build out the pipeline for a Vietnamese chatbot model.
